title: Cloudbreakers: Legend of the Sunlight Prince
description: Every society has its fables, and the kingdom of Hai'Leigh is no exception. Discover the legend told to the children who would one day become Cloudbreakers.The Kingdom of Hai'Leigh has been at the mercy of a dark wizard for longer than most can remember. When Lynn's younger brother is captured by monsters, she embarks on a journey led by hope, and discovers the courage and power within that may just save their dying world.
author: K.J. Moore
